Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Ayayayyo aanandhamey
nenjukullae arambambamey

nooru kodi vaanavil
maari maari serudhey
kaadhal podum thuralil
thegam moolgi pogudhey

Yedho oru aasai
va va kadha pesa
ayayayayayo…. ayayayayayo

Unnai mudhal murai kanda nodiyinil
thanni kullae vizhundhen
Andru vizhundhavan innum ezhumbala
mella mella karaindhen
karai sera neeyum kaiyil yendha vaa
uyir kaadhalodu naanum neendhava

kangalil kandadhu paadhi
varum karpanai thandhadhu meedhi
thodudhey….sududhey….manadhey..

Kangal irupadhu unnai rasithida
endru solla pirandhen
kaigal irupadhu thottu anaithida
allikolla thunidhen
yetharkaaga kaalgal kelvi ketkiren
thunai serndhu pooga thedhi paarkiren

netriyil kungumam sooda
ilam1 nenjinil inbamum kooda
medhuva…varava….tharava…

nooru kodi vaanavil
maari maari serudhey
kaadhal podum thuralil English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
